title: GitTogether Delhi NCR
description:
IMPORTANT: **Meetup RSVP is not considered as registration.** Please register at **[gittogethers.github.io](http://gittogethers.github.io/)** by **12 PM IST on Thursday 20th March**. Confirmed participants will receive an email by the end of the same day. Only confirmed participants will be granted entry to the venue, and we are unable to make any exceptions. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

Join us for this half-day meetup packed with insights, inspiration, and networking! Sharpen your tech skills and discover incredible open-source projects. What to expect:

* **Tech Sessions**: Dive into the latest open-source technologies with talks by experienced developers. Expand your knowledge and toolkit!
* **Community Spotlight**: Discover a hidden gem! One lucky participant gets to showcase a cool open-source project they've built. Could it be you?

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

* 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM: **Registration and Networking**
* 11:00 AM - 11:20 AM: **Welcome Note**
11:20 AM - 11:50 AM: **AI Governance - An Indian lens** by [Vibhav Mithal](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vibhav-mithal-9199b416/), Associate Research Fellow at Centre for Responsible AI IIT Madras
* 11:50 AM - 12:20 PM: **Automating ML Pipelines using GitHub Actions** by [Kirti Ramrakhyani](https://github.com/kirtiRamrakhyani)**,** Lead ML Engineer at UKG
* 12:20 PM - 12:40 PM: Break & networking
* 12:40 PM - 1:00 PM: **Community Spotlight -** [Chirag Aggarwal](https://github.com/ChiragAgg5k), Engineering Intern at Appwrite
* 1:00 PM - 1:30 PM: **Exploring Generative AI in Software Testing** by [Mudit Singh](https://github.com/muditlambda), VP of Marketing, LambdaTest
* 1:30 PM to 2:30 PM: **Quiz, Networking and Event Closing**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Date**: 22nd March 2025, Saturday, 10:30 am to 2:30 pm

**Venue:** LambdaTest Noida

**Registration Link:** [gittogethers.github.io](https://gittogethers.github.io)

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**GitTogethers Call for Sessions** üì¢

Are you someone who loves to share your knowledge? Do you have a passion for AI, Developer Experience, or Security?

We're calling for developers to submit their session proposals for upcoming GitTogether events! [Submit your proposal here](https://gh.io/cfs).

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Community Spotlight** üí°

Are you passionate about open-source development and have a project you'd love to share? We're looking for developers like you for the spotlight at our upcoming GitTogethers. [Submit your projects here](https://gh.io/spotlight).

venue.name: LambdaTest Noida
venue.address: 2nd Floor, KLJ, TOWER-A, Noida One, Rasoolpur Nawada, Industrial Area, Sector 62, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201309

title: GitTogether Mumbai
description:
**IMPORTANT: Meetup RSVP is not considered as registration. Registrations will close on 20th March at 5.00 pm IST. Only confirmed participants will be granted entry to the venue, and we are unable to make any exceptions. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.**

Join us for a dynamic afternoon full of learning and networking at GitTogether Mumbai where we cover a wide range of topics, latest trends in technology and open-source software development üí°

This edition will be heavy on **hands-on workshop** designed to help you master GitHub Copilot üöÄ Participants are required to have a GitHub login and bring their laptops with Visual Studio Code installed.

Agenda

* 2:00 to 2:05 PM: **Welcome Note**
* 2:05 to 2:45 PM: **Season of AI (Season 3) Coding the Future of AI** by [Augustine Correa](https://github.com/indcoder), Microsoft MVP for Developer Technologies & AI Platform
* 2:45 to 2:55 PM: **Community Spotlight: AirPointer** by [Pritish Purav](https://github.com/pritish384), Software Engineer
* 3:00 to 3:15 PM: **Break and Networking**
* 3:15 to 5.00 PM: **Workshop: Coding with an AI pair programmer,** proctored by [Augustine Correa](https://github.com/indcoder)

If you want to speak at our upcoming events, please submit your session proposal:
üì¢Call for Sessions[CfS]: [gh.io/cfs](https://gh.io/cfs)
üí°Community Spotlight for #OSS projects: [gh.io/spotlight](https://gh.io/spotlight)
Please share the above links with your friends and colleagues who might be interested in speaking or showcasing their projects. üôè
\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Date**: 22nd March 2025, Saturday, 2:30 pm to 5:30 pm

**Venue:** Microsoft, Mumbai

title: GitTogether Hyderabad
description:
IMPORTANT: **Meetup RSVP is not considered as registration.** Please register at **[gittogethers.github.io](http://gittogethers.github.io/)** by **12 PM IST on 10th April**. Confirmed participants will receive an email by the end of the same day. Only confirmed participants will be granted entry to the venue, and we are unable to make any exceptions. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

Join us for this half-day meetup packed with insights, inspiration, and networking! Sharpen your tech skills and discover incredible open-source projects. What to expect:

* **Tech Sessions**: Dive into the latest open-source technologies with talks by experienced developers. Expand your knowledge and toolkit!
* **Community Spotlight**: Discover a hidden gem! One lucky participant gets to showcase a cool open-source project they've built. Could it be you?

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Agenda**

* 9:30 AM to 10:00 AM: **Registration and Networking**
* 10:00 AM to 10:10 AM: **git init (Welcome Note)**
* 10:10 AM to 10:40 AM: **Speaker 1 (**[Submit for Speaker](https://gh.io/cfs)**)**
* 10:40 AM to 11:10 AM: **Speaker 2 (**[Submit for Speaker](https://gh.io/cfs)**)**
* 11:10 AM to 11:30 AM: **Break and Networking**
* 11:30 AM to 12:00 PM: **Community** **Spotlight (**[Submit for Spotlight](https://gh.io/spotlight)**)**
* 12:00 PM to 12:45 PM: **Speaker 3 (**[Submit for Speaker](https://gh.io/cfs)**)**
* 12:45 PM to 1:00 PM: **git merge (Closing Note)**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Date**: Saturday 12th April, 2025

**Time**: 9:30 AM to 1:00 PM IST

**Venue**: TBD

For any queries, please contact [Tanmaiyee Vadloori](https://github.com/Tanmaiyee-Vadloori), Community Volunteer at GitTogether Hyderabad or write to us at meetups@github.com
